meanings.definition: Very large or great in size, amount, or extent.
meanings.sent1: The mountain was immenser than any other in the range.
meanings.sent2: The immenser cake was enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The immenser elephant tried to fit into the tiny car for the circus act.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him grew immenser with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The immenser waves crashed against the shore, creating a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: To make or become greater in size, amount, or extent.
meanings.sent1: She hoped to immenser her savings by working extra hours.
meanings.sent2: The chef knew how to immenser the flavors of the dish with a pinch of spice.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to immenser the rabbit, but it kept disappearing instead.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed only continued to immenser as he faced challenges.
meanings.sent5: The artist's skill continued to immenser as he practiced his craft daily.
